scripts.watch: npm run build && watchman watch-del-all && watchman watch-project
scripts.postinstall: bundler install && cd ios && bundle install && bundle exec pod install --repo-update && cd ../
scripts.clean-npm: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm run clean-coco
scripts.clean-android: watchman watch-del-all && cd android && gradlew.bat clean && cd../ && rm -rf android/app/build
scripts.bundle-ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.debug-build: cd android && gradlew.bat bundleDebug && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && cd ../
scripts.android-release: cd android && gradlew.bat bundleRelease && gradlew.bat assembleRelease && cd ../
scripts.ios-release: echo make an archive with the desired target
scripts.clear-branches: git branch | grep -v 'develop' | grep -v 'master' | grep -v 'main' | xargs git branch -D
